00019     SWTraversal::SWTraversal  (Occlusion& o):
00020         occlusion(o), 
00021         mCurrentVisibility (PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::NONE),
00022         camPos(occlusion.mCurrentCam->getPosition ())
00023     {
00024         
00025     }
00026     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00027     void SWTraversal::traverseChildren(PagingLandScapeOctree & node)
00028     {
00029             FrontToBackNodeSorterPriorityQueue myStack = FrontToBackNodeSorterPriorityQueue(FrontToBackNodeSorterOperator (camPos));
00030        
00031         //assert (node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible);
00032         if (!node.mNodes.empty())
00033         {
00034             PagingLandScapeOctreeNodeList::const_iterator it =  node.mNodes.begin();
00035             while (it != node.mNodes.end())
00036             {
00037                  myStack.push(*it);
00038                 ++it;
00039             }
00040         }
00041 
00042         PagingLandScapeOctree *n = 
00043             node.mChildren[ 0 ][ 0 ][ 0 ];
00044         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00045             myStack.push (n);
00046         n = node.mChildren[ 1 ][ 0 ][ 0 ];
00047         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00048             myStack.push (n);
00049         n = node.mChildren[ 0 ][ 1 ][ 0 ];
00050         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00051             myStack.push (n);
00052         n = node.mChildren[ 1 ][ 1 ][ 0 ];
00053         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00054             myStack.push (n);
00055         n = node.mChildren[ 0 ][ 0 ][ 1 ];
00056         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00057             myStack.push (n);
00058         n = node.mChildren[ 1 ][ 0 ][ 1 ];
00059         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00060             myStack.push (n);
00061         n = node.mChildren[ 0 ][ 1 ][ 1 ];
00062         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00063             myStack.push (n);
00064         n = node.mChildren[ 1 ][ 1 ][ 1 ];
00065         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00066             myStack.push (n);
00067 
00068         //traverse nearer child first
00069         while (!myStack.empty ())
00070         {
00071                 OcclusionElement& nstacked = *myStack.top ();
00072                 myStack.pop ();
00073             nstacked.traversal(*this);
00074         }
00075     }
00076     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     bool SWTraversal::isVisible(OcclusionElement & n) 
00078     {
00079         // issue query
00080         if (n.isLeaf () && n.isOccluder() )
00081         {
00082             if (occlusion.issueDrawQuery (static_cast <PagingLandScapeOctreeNode &> (n)))
00083             {
00084                 // we just wait for result
00085                 return occlusion.isQueryResultIsVisible (n);
00086             }
00087             else
00088             {
00089                 return false;
00090             }
00091         }
00092         else
00093         { 
00094             occlusion.issueBboxQuery (n); 
00095             // we just wait for result
00096                 return occlusion.isQueryResultIsVisible (n);
00097         }
00098                
00099     }
00100     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00101     void SWTraversal::onLeaf(PagingLandScapeOctreeNode &n)
00102     {
00103         if(occlusion.mCurrentCam->isVisible (n.getCullBoundingBox ()))
00104         {
00105 
00106                     #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00107                     occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00108                 n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = true;
00109                     #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG   
00110 
00111             const bool isitVisible = isVisible (n);
00112                     if (isitVisible) 
00113             {
00114                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00115                                 occlusion.object_cnt++;
00116                 #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG   
00117                 occlusion.queueDraw (n);
00118             } 
00119                     #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00120                         n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = isitVisible;
00121                     #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG   
00122 
00123         }
00124 
00125                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00126                 else 
00127                 {
00128                     occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00129                 n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = false;
00130                         occlusion.frustum_culled_nodes_cnt++;
00131                 }
00132                 #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00133     }
00134     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00135     void SWTraversal::onTree(PagingLandScapeOctree & n)
00136     {
00137         if(occlusion.mCurrentCam->isVisible(n.getCullBoundingBox ())) 
00138         {
00139 
00140                     #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00141                     occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++; 
00142                 n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = true;
00143                     #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00144 
00145             const bool isitVisible = isVisible(n);
00146 
00147                     if (isitVisible) 
00148             {
00149                 traverseChildren (n);
00150                     }
00151 
00152                     #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00153                         n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = isitVisible;
00154                     #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00155 
00156             }
00157 
00158                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00159                 else 
00160             {
00161                     occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++; 
00162                 n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = false;
00163                         occlusion.frustum_culled_nodes_cnt++;
00164                 }
00165                 #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00166     }
